titleStmt.title: The nationall covenant. Or, A discourse on the covenant. Wherein also the severall parts of the late protestation are proved to be grounded on religion and reason: with sundry motives and directions, tending to further our keeping covenant with God. Which may be of speciall use in these times. By Tho. Mocket, M. of Arts, and preacher of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Mocket, Thomas, 1602-1670?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. R. for Chr. Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in Pauls church-yard
